name: Grilled Salmon
description: A delicious grilled salmon served with a side of vegetables.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Classic Caesar salad topped with grilled chicken breast.

name: Beef Burger
description: Juicy beef burger with lettuce, tomato, and secret sauce.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A delicious pizza topped with a variety of fresh vegetables.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Creamy pasta with eggs, cheese, bacon, and a touch of parsley.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: Spicy Thai soup with shrimp, mushrooms, and lemongrass.

name: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of fresh sushi rolls, including salmon, tuna, and avocado.

name: Lamb Chops
description: Tender lamb chops grilled to perfection with herbs and spices.

name: Falafel Wrap
description: Middle Eastern falafel wrap with tahini sauce and vegetables.

name: Steak Frites
description: Classic steak frites with garlic butter and a side of fries.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with wild mushrooms and a sprinkle of parmesan cheese.

name: Pad Thai
description: Traditional Thai noodles stir-fried with eggs, tofu, and tamarind sauce.

name: Fish and Chips
description: Crispy battered fish served with chips and tartar sauce.

name: Quinoa Salad
description: Healthy quinoa salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, and feta cheese.

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: Slow-cooked pulled pork with BBQ sauce and coleslaw on a bun.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with mascarpone cheese and dusted with cocoa.

name: French Onion Soup
description: Rich onion soup topped with cheese and a slice of toasted bread.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Indian spiced curry with grilled chicken pieces and creamy sauce.

name: Chocolate Cake
description: Rich and moist chocolate cake with a layer of chocolate frosting.

name: Raspberry Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake with a raspberry swirl and a graham cracker crust.
